mapper.select: select a.no, a.title, a.contents, a.reg_date as regDate, a.hit, a.group_no, a.order_no, a.depth, b.no, b.name from board a, user b where a.user_no = b.no and a.no = #{no}
mapper.update: update board set order_no=?+1 where group_no= #{groupNo} and order_no>= #{orderNo}
update board set title = #{title} , contents = #{contents} where no = #{no}
update board set hit = hit + 1 where no = #{no}
mapper.select: select a.no , a.title , a.contents , a.reg_date as redDate, a.depth , a.hit , b.no as UserNo , b.name as UserName from board a ,user b where a.user_no = b.no and a.title like concat('%', #{searchValue}, '%') order by a.group_no desc , a.order_no asc limit #{first} , #{second}
